mapper.select: SELECT t.id as a_id,t.title as a_title,t.content as a_content,t.user_id as a_user_id, t.release_time as a_release_time,t.see_num as a_see_num,t.column_id as a_column_id, t.enabled as a_enabled,t.create_data_time as a_create_data_time,t.create_data_username as a_create_data_username, t.update_data_time as a_update_data_time,t.update_data_username as a_update_data_username, u.nickname,(SELECT count(1) FROM reply_t rep WHERE rep.article_id = t.id) as replyNum, ta.id as t_id,ta.name as t_name, ta.code as t_code FROM article_t t LEFT JOIN user_t u ON u.id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN column_t c ON c.id = t.column_id LEFT JOIN article_tag_t att ON att.article_id = t.id LEFT JOIN tag_t ta ON ta.id = att.tag_id WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE article_t SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, column_id = #{columnId}, update_data_time = #{updateDataTime}, update_data_username = #{updateDataUsername} WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE article_t SET enabled=#{enabled} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE article_t SET see_num = see_num + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
